title: Apidura x Canyon Grizzly bag crossover refines Racing Series for off-road adventure
content:
Apidura’s new collaboration with Canyon has produced a Grizzly bikepacking bag crossover, refining the best of the Apdura Racing Series to make it more off-road-ready. Developed to equip the new Canyon Grizl gravel bike, the light & compact Grizzly bikepacking bags aren’t actually new shapes, sizes, or even Canyon-specific, instead, they combine the best features […]

The post Apidura x Canyon Grizzly bag crossover refines Racing Series for off-road adventure appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
